Name: Zombie VS Police
About the game: Zombie VS Police is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies. In this game you have to play as a police officer who fights zombies and protects his hometown! Try to survive in a city where a zombie virus is rampant! In this incredibly interesting game, you have to play as a real policeman who protects his city at the cost of his own life. Defend yourself from zombies attacking you. They want to eat you!!! In this game, you can drive a car and crush zombies. Immerse yourself in the world of the zombie apocalypse and protect the city! In the game you will find beautiful graphics and fun music! Game Features: Fun music and cool atmosphere! Catchy, intuitive gameplay! Incredibly beautiful city! Very beautiful graphics!
